tool_description: This API provides the average monthly arctic sea ice extent each  September since 1979,  derived from satellite observations.
title: Melted polar ice cap

api_list.name: Melted polar ice cap_copy
api_list.description: The response will be an object with no CORS resources enabled.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://melted-polar-ice-cap.p.rapidapi.com/api/arctic-api"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "melted-polar-ice-cap.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
